jcr:content.jcr:title: Public holidays in Bosnia and Herzegovina

contentheadline.headline: Public holidays in Bosnia and Herzegovina

contentrichtext.text: {{Use mdy dates|date=November 2011}} {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} The [[Public holiday|holiday]]s of [[Bosnia and Herzegovina]] include, in [[Political divisions of Bosnia and Herzegovina|various jurisdictions]]: ==Public Holidays== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Date !! English Name !! Local Name !! Notes <tr> <td colspan="4" align="center">According to the [[Gregorian calendar|Gregorian]] and [[Julian calendar|Julian]] calendars</td> </tr> <tr> <td>January 1 and 2</td> <td>[[New Year]]</td> <td>Nova godina</td> <td></td> </tr> <tr> <td>January 6</td> <td>[[Epiphany (feast)|Epiphany]]</td> <td>Sveta tri kralja (Bogojavljenje)</td> <td>[[Roman Catholicism in Bosnia and Herzegovina|Roman Catholic]] feast</td> </tr> <tr> <td>January 7</td> <td>[[Christmas]]</td> <td>Božić</td> <td>Orthodox</td> </tr> <tr> <td>January 9</td> <td>[[Republic Day]]</td> <td>Dan Republike</td> <td>[[Republika Srpska]]</td> </tr> <tr> <td>January 14</td> <td>[[New Year]]</td> <td>Nova godina</td> <td></td> </tr> <tr> <td>March 1</td> <td>[[Independence day]]</td> <td>Dan nezavisnosti</td> <td>[[Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina]]</td> </tr> <tr>Easter always falls on a Sunday from March 22 to April 25 inclusive. <td>[[moveable feast|...]]</td> <td>[[Easter]]</td> <td>Uskrs</td> <td>[[Roman Catholicism in Bosnia and Herzegovina|Roman Catholic]] feast</td> </tr> <tr> <td>[[moveable feast|...]]</td> <td>[[Easter]]</td> <td>Vaskrs</td> <td>Orthodox</td> </tr> <tr> <td>May 1 and 2</td> <td>[[Labour Day]]</td> <td>Međunarodni praznik rada</td> </tr> <tr> <td>''60 days post Easter''</td> <td>[[Corpus Christi (feast)|Corpus Christi]]</td> <td>Tijelovo</td> <td>variable date<br />[[Roman Catholicism in Bosnia and Herzegovina|Roman Catholic]] feast</td> </tr> <tr> <td>May 6</td> <td>[[St. George]]'s Day</td> <td>Đurđevdan</td> <td>Orthodox</td> </tr> <tr> <td>May 9</td> <td>[[Victory Day (Eastern Europe)]]</td> <td>Dan pobjede na fašizmom</td> <td>[[Republika Srpska]]</td> </tr> <tr> <td>June 28</td> <td>[[St. Vitus]]' Day</td> <td>Vidovdan</td> <td>Orthodox</td> </tr> <tr> <td>July 12</td> <td>[[St. Peter]]'s Day</td> <td>Petrovdan</td> <td>Orthodox</td> </tr> <tr> <td>August 2</td> <td>[[St. Elijah]]'s Day</td> <td>Ilindan</td> <td>Orthodox</td> </tr> <tr> <td>August 15</td> <td>[[Assumption of Mary]]</td> <td>Velika Gospa</td> <td>[[Roman Catholicism in Bosnia and Herzegovina|Roman Catholic]] feast</td> </tr> <tr> <td>August 28</td> <td>[[Assumption of Mary]]</td> <td>Velika Gospojina</td> <td>Orthodox</td> </tr> <tr> <td>September 8</td> <td>[[Nativity of the Blessed Virgin Mary|Nativity]] of [[Mary, mother of Jesus|Virgin Mary]]</td> <td>Mala Gospa</td> <td>[[Roman Catholicism in Bosnia and Herzegovina|Roman Catholic]] feast</td> </tr> <tr> <td>September 21</td> <td>Nativity of Virgin Mary</td> <td>Mala Gospojina</td> <td>Orthodox</td> </tr> <tr> <td>November 1</td> <td>[[All Saints Day]]</td> <td>Svi Sveti</td> <td>[[Roman Catholicism in Bosnia and Herzegovina|Roman Catholic]] feast</td> </tr> <tr> <td>November 2</td> <td>[[All Souls Day]]</td> <td>Dan mrtvih</td> <td>[[Roman Catholicism in Bosnia and Herzegovina|Roman Catholic]] feast</td> </tr> <tr> <td>November 8</td> <td>[[St. Demetrius]]' day</td> <td>Mitrovdan</td> <td>Orthodox</td> </tr> <tr> <td>November 21</td> <td>[[Dayton Agreement]] Day</td> <td>Dan uspostave Opšteg okvirnog sporazuma za mir u Bosni i Hercegovini</td> <td>[[Republika Srpska]]</td> </tr> <tr> <td>November 25</td> <td>[[Statehood Day]]</td> <td>Dan državnosti</td> <td>[[Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina]]</td> </tr> <tr> <td>December 25</td> <td>[[Christmas]]</td> <td>Božić</td> <td>[[Roman Catholicism in Bosnia and Herzegovina|Roman Catholic]] feast</td> </tr> <tr> <td>December 26</td> <td>[[St. Stephen's Day]]</td> <td>Stipandan (Stjepandan)</td> <td>[[Roman Catholicism in Bosnia and Herzegovina|Roman Catholic]] feast</td> </tr> <tr> <td colspan="4" align="center">According to the [[Islamic calendar]]</td> </tr> <tr> <td>1<sup>st</sup> day of [[Muharram]]</td> <td>New Year</td> <td>Muslimanska Nova Godina</td> <td>Islam</td> </tr> <tr> <td>12<sup>th</sup> day of Rabee'ul-Awwal</td> <td>[[Muhammad|Prophet]]'s Anniversary</td> <td>[[Mawlid|Mevlud]]</td> <td></td> </tr> <tr> <td>10<sup>th</sup> day of [[Dhul Hijja]]</td> <td>[[Eid ul-Adha]]</td> <td>Kurban Bajram</td> <td>Religious holiday for 4 days</td> </tr> <tr> <td>1<sup>st</sup> day of Shawwal</td> <td>[[Eid ul-Fitr]]</td> <td>Ramazanski Bajram</td> <td>Religious holiday for 3 days</td> </tr> |} == References == {{Reflist}} {{Bosnia and Herzegovina topics}} {{Public holidays in Europe}}
